discord_bot.how_to_get_notified: How to get notified when an order is placed
discord_bot.how_to_get_notified_answer: Add the official [SC Market Discord Bot](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=868709691469987860&permissions=361314126849&integration_type=0&scope=bot) to your server to automatically receive direct messages when an order is placed with you or assigned to you. Alternatively, use the below configuration to fulfill orders through [SC Market's Official Server]({{DISCORD_INVITE}}).
discord_bot.how_to_communicate: How to communicate with buyers through Discord
discord_bot.how_to_communicate_answer:
Add the official [SC Market Discord Bot](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=868709691469987860&permissions=361314126849&integration_type=0&scope=bot) to your server and you can register a channel to automatically create threads between sellers and buyers when an order is placed. Buyers will automatically be invited to your server where you can work with them to fulfill the order.

1. Add [the Bot](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=868709691469987860&permissions=361314126849&integration_type=0&scope=bot) to your server

2. Run `/register Server` targeting either an individual user or an org contractor. For example, to have orders associated with you as an individual, run `/register Server User`. To register on behalf of an org `/register Server Contractor ORGNAME`. After doing so, users will automatically be invited to your server when placing an order.

3. Run `/register Channel` targeting either an individual user or an org contractor. For example, to have orders associated with you as an individual, run `/register Channel User`. To register on behalf of an org `/register Channel Contractor ORGNAME`. After doing so, users will automatically be added to threads with the person assigned to their orders.

privacy_settings.title: Privacy
privacy_settings.request_data_description: Request your data associated with the site. This function is a work in progress and does not represent all of your data. We are working to make this as complete as possible, but for now this contains most of the information associated with your user account.

sellMaterials.title: We Buy Resources!
sellMaterials.subtitle: Sell your resources in bulk with us! Skip the refining process and sell to us at a premium!

cart.submitOfferDesc: Submit Offer to send your offer and negotiate and coordinate with the seller.

landing.subtitle: Buy and sell goods. Buy and sell services.
landing.buySellItemsText: List your items to be sold in whatever quantity you support. Get alerts in Discord when someone places an order, and work with buyers to fulfill their orders. We don't take a cut.
landing.tradeInBulkText: Whether you have 5 FS-9s to sell or 50, we want to support you. List your items in bulk or individually and manage your stock with the click of a button.
landing.orderServicesText: Do you or your org have provide a service? Whether its medical rescue, hauler escort, sourcing items or otherwise, find a home on SC Market where you can discover the many services being provided throughout the 'verse.
landing.orgsHelpText: We enable orgs to coordinate their members to fulfill orders and render services. Become a trusted group customers come to when they need work done.
landing.supportersThanks: Thank you to all of our
landing.faqSellItemsA: Create market listings for the items you want to sell. Buyers can add the items they want to their cart, then place an order with you for those items. From there it is up to you and the buyer to arrange a time and place to exchange the aUEC and goods.
landing.faqSafeQ: Is SC Market safe to use?
landing.faqSafeA: Because we don't handle any of the goods or aUEC ourselves, we cannot make any guarantees. However, we do provide ways for buyers and sellers to review each other, so you can be sure that others have had positive experiences with a seller if you are wary of being scammed.
landing.faqListThingsQ: What kinds of things can I list on SC Market?
landing.faqListThingsA: You can list any item or service as long as you accept aUEC in exchange for it. Items and services should generally be related to Star Citizen and services may be conducted in our out of the game itself.
landing.faqFeeQ: Does SC Market take a fee?
landing.faqFeeA: No we do not. All services are provided here free of charge and no aUEC passes through us.
landing.faqRealMoneyQ: Can I list items for real money?
landing.faqRealMoneyA: No. All transactions on SC Market should be completed in aUEC.
